entry.title: $2450 // !HOT! Just steps to Botancal gardens, Eastern Pkwy, and prospect prk!
entry.content:
Beautiful, gut renovated, massive 2 bedroom apartment!
conveniently located on the corner of President street and FRANKLIN AVE In prime crown heights!

Very nice neighborhood with tons of restaurants cafes and bars just steps away
Right on Franklin ave which is lined with restaurants, cafes, bars and Starbucks
also just steps to the 2,3,4,5 Franklin Ave stop, Prospect park, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and Brooklyn Museum.

Apt Includes:
- 2 king size bedrooms
- Beautiful brand new kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances
- Beautiful fully tiled bathroom
- Massive separate living-room
- Good closet space
- Great sunlight
- Heat and hot water included
- Live in super
- Top floor apt


STEPS TO:
Great laundromat right around the corner
Prospect park, Brooklyn Museum, grand army plaza, Eastern Parkway, Botanical Gardens.
Brooklyn public library
The Franklin ave 2,3,4,5 & shuttle trains
lots of shops bars, cafe's, restaurants, grocery stores, supermarkets Starbucks and much more...

Call or tex Mushka at 3473621311 to set up your viewing now!
